text: Hi everyone, I am Faith, a 1st year phd student in statistics in Quebec City. I started using R in my undergrad, but hoping to be more involved in the R community. My research lies in survival analysis and missing data stuff. My goal this summer is to learn how to build a package on my own and learn Shiny. Looking forward to the online useR conference in july (and their tutorials if anyone is going). :slightly_smiling_face:
